title: Trading Card Game (TCG) Twisted Fate skin concept!
body:
Has this been done before? If not, it would be just hilarious!

Here is my take on how the skin would look like. I put some details that usually would represent the common TCG-aficionado. Any feedback given or ideas that could be implemented are taken very gratefully!

*Writing on drawing pads is a pain in the ass.

*I've considered on adding the Yu Gi Oh duel disk, but it would be pretty obvious to get a copyright infringement.

*I know fedoras and trenchoats could represent a further "otaku" look to it, and card collector, but so far I decided to not make him look that way.

replies.body:
Lack of gravity defying hair that immediately identifies one as the main character of a TCG anime.

There must be enough hair for two people on that head for it to truly be a TCG skin.
I want a whole butt load of nerd skins. This is a nice idea, and another good one would be like TableTop Games Syndra, where her Q's are D20's
This is a really clever and awesome idea.
Thanks alot! I wish more people would check it out
